titleStmt.title: A synopsis, or contact view, of the life of John Armand, Cardinall of Richlieu, great favorite and minister of state to Lewis the 13th. King of France. To bee engraven on his tombe. First written in Latine, and now verbatim rendered English.

titleStmt.author: Morgues, Matthieu de, sieur de Saint-Germain, 1582-1670.
